sentences.zh: 秦之先，帝顓頊之苗裔孫曰女修。

translations.text: Qin ancestors, Emperor Zhuan Xu descendants offspring called Nu Xiu.

sentences.zh: 女修織，玄鳥隕卵，女修吞之，生子大業。

translations.text: Nu Xiu weaving, dark bird fell egg, Nu Xiu swallowed it, gave birth son Da Ye.

sentences.zh: 大業取少典之子，曰女華。

translations.text: Da Ye took Shao Dian son, called Nu Hua.

sentences.zh: 女華生大費，與禹平水土。

translations.text: Nu Hua gave birth Da Fei, with Yu pacified water earth.

sentences.zh: 已成，帝錫玄圭。

translations.text: Already completed, Emperor granted black gui.

sentences.zh: 禹受曰：「非予能成，亦大費為輔。」

translations.text: Yu received said: 'Not I able complete, also Da Fei as assistant.'

sentences.zh: 帝舜曰：「咨爾費，贊禹功，其賜爾皁游。

translations.text: Emperor Shun said: 'Consult you Fei, assist Yu merit, its grant you black you.

sentences.zh: 爾後嗣將大出。」

translations.text: Your later descendants will greatly emerge.'

sentences.zh: 乃妻之姚姓之玉女。

translations.text: Then married him Yao surname jade woman.

sentences.zh: 大費拜受，佐舜調馴鳥獸，鳥獸多馴服，是為柏翳。

translations.text: Da Fei bowed received, assisted Shun tamed birds beasts, birds beasts many tamed, this was Bo Yi.

sentences.zh: 舜賜姓嬴氏。

translations.text: Shun granted surname Ying clan.

Qin ancestors, Emperor Zhuan Xu descendants offspring called Nu Xiu. Nu Xiu weaving, dark bird fell egg, Nu Xiu swallowed it, gave birth son Da Ye. Da Ye took Shao Dian son, called Nu Hua. Nu Hua gave birth Da Fei, with Yu pacified water earth. Already completed, Emperor granted black gui. Yu received said: 'Not I able complete, also Da Fei as assistant.' Emperor Shun said: 'Consult you Fei, assist Yu merit, its grant you black you. Your later descendants will greatly emerge.' Then married him Yao surname jade woman. Da Fei bowed received, assisted Shun tamed birds beasts, birds beasts many tamed, this was Bo Yi. Shun granted surname Ying clan.

sentences.zh: 大費生子二人：一曰大廉，實鳥俗氏；

translations.text: Da Fei gave birth sons two: one called Da Lian, established bird custom clan;

sentences.zh: 二曰若木，實費氏。

translations.text: Two called Ruo Mu, established Fei clan.

sentences.zh: 其玄孫曰費昌，子孫或在中國，或在夷狄。

translations.text: Their dark grandson called Fei Chang, descendants or in central states, or in Yi Di.

sentences.zh: 費昌當夏桀之時，去夏歸商，為湯御，以敗桀於鳴條。

translations.text: Fei Chang when Xia Jie time, left Xia returned Shang, for Tang drove chariot, with defeated Jie at Ming Tiao.

sentences.zh: 大廉玄孫曰孟戲、中衍，鳥身人言。

translations.text: Da Lian dark grandson called Meng Xi, Zhong Yan, bird body human speech.

sentences.zh: 帝太戊聞而卜之使御，吉，遂致使御而妻之。

translations.text: Emperor Tai Wu heard divined made them drive chariot, auspicious, then caused drove chariot married them.

sentences.zh: 自太戊以下，中衍之後，遂世有功，以佐殷國，故嬴姓多顯，遂為諸侯。

translations.text: From Tai Wu below, Zhong Yan descendants, then generations had merit, with assisted Yin state, thus Ying surname many prominent, then became feudal lords.

Da Fei gave birth sons two: one called Da Lian, established bird custom clan; Two called Ruo Mu, established Fei clan. Their dark grandson called Fei Chang, descendants or in central states, or in Yi Di. Fei Chang when Xia Jie time, left Xia returned Shang, for Tang drove chariot, with defeated Jie at Ming Tiao. Da Lian dark grandson called Meng Xi, Zhong Yan, bird body human speech. Emperor Tai Wu heard divined made them drive chariot, auspicious, then caused drove chariot married them. From Tai Wu below, Zhong Yan descendants, then generations had merit, with assisted Yin state, thus Ying surname many prominent, then became feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 其玄孫曰中潏，在西戎，保西垂。

translations.text: Their dark grandson called Zhong Jue, at western Rong, protected western border.

sentences.zh: 生蜚廉。

translations.text: Gave birth Fei Lian.

sentences.zh: 蜚廉生惡來。

translations.text: Fei Lian gave birth E Lai.

sentences.zh: 惡來有力，蜚廉善走，父子俱以材力事殷紂。

translations.text: E Lai had strength, Fei Lian good running, father son both with talents served Yin Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周武王之伐紂，并殺惡來。

translations.text: Zhou Wu Wang attacked Zhou, together killed E Lai.

sentences.zh: 是時蜚廉為紂石北方，還，無所報，為壇霍太山而報，得石棺，銘曰「帝令處父不與殷亂，賜爾石棺以華氏」。

translations.text: At time Fei Lian for Zhou made northern stones, returned, without report, made altar Huo Tai mountain reported, got stone coffin, inscription said 'Heavenly command Chu Fu not with Yin chaos, grant you stone coffin with Hua clan'.

sentences.zh: 死，遂葬於霍太山。

translations.text: Died, then buried at Huo Tai mountain.

sentences.zh: 蜚廉復有子曰季勝。

translations.text: Fei Lian again had son called Ji Sheng.

sentences.zh: 季勝生孟增。

translations.text: Ji Sheng gave birth Meng Zeng.

sentences.zh: 孟增幸於周成王，是為宅皋狼。

translations.text: Meng Zeng favored by Zhou Cheng Wang, this was Zhai Gao Lang.

sentences.zh: 皋狼生衡父，衡父生造父。

translations.text: Gao Lang gave birth Heng Fu, Heng Fu gave birth Zao Fu.

sentences.zh: 造父以善御幸於周繆王，得驥、溫驪、驊騮、騄耳之駟，西巡狩，樂而忘歸。

translations.text: Zao Fu with good driving favored Zhou Mu Wang, got Ji, Wen Li, Hua Liu, Luo Er four horses, west inspected, happy forgot return.

sentences.zh: 徐偃王作亂，造父為繆王御，長驅歸周，一日千里以救亂。

translations.text: Xu Jian Wang made chaos, Zao Fu for Mu Wang drove chariot, long drove returned Zhou, one day thousand li saved chaos.

sentences.zh: 繆王以趙城封造父，造父族由此為趙氏。

translations.text: Mu Wang with Zhao city sealed Zao Fu, Zao Fu clan from this became Zhao clan.

sentences.zh: 自蜚廉生季勝已下五世至造父，別居趙。

translations.text: From Fei Lian gave birth Ji Sheng already below five generations to Zao Fu, separately dwelt Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙衰其後也。

translations.text: Zhao Shuai their descendant.

sentences.zh: 惡來革者，蜚廉子也，蚤死。

translations.text: E Lai Ge, Fei Lian son, early died.

sentences.zh: 有子曰女防。

translations.text: Had son called Nu Fang.

sentences.zh: 女防生旁皋，旁皋生太幾，太幾生大駱，大駱生非子。

translations.text: Nu Fang gave birth Pang Gao, Pang Gao gave birth Tai Ji, Tai Ji gave birth Da Luo, Da Luo gave birth Fei Zi.

sentences.zh: 以造父之寵，皆蒙趙城，姓趙氏。

translations.text: With Zao Fu favor, all received Zhao city, surname Zhao clan.

Their dark grandson called Zhong Jue, at western Rong, protected western border. Gave birth Fei Lian. Fei Lian gave birth E Lai. E Lai had strength, Fei Lian good running, father son both with talents served Yin Zhou. Zhou Wu Wang attacked Zhou, together killed E Lai. At time Fei Lian for Zhou made northern stones, returned, without report, made altar Huo Tai mountain reported, got stone coffin, inscription said 'Heavenly command Chu Fu not with Yin chaos, grant you stone coffin with Hua clan'. Died, then buried at Huo Tai mountain. Fei Lian again had son called Ji Sheng. Ji Sheng gave birth Meng Zeng. Meng Zeng favored by Zhou Cheng Wang, this was Zhai Gao Lang. Gao Lang gave birth Heng Fu, Heng Fu gave birth Zao Fu. Zao Fu with good driving favored Zhou Mu Wang, got Ji, Wen Li, Hua Liu, Luo Er four horses, west inspected, happy forgot return. Xu Jian Wang made chaos, Zao Fu for Mu Wang drove chariot, long drove returned Zhou, one day thousand li saved chaos. Mu Wang with Zhao city sealed Zao Fu, Zao Fu clan from this became Zhao clan. From Fei Lian gave birth Ji Sheng already below five generations to Zao Fu, separately dwelt Zhao. Zhao Shuai their descendant. E Lai Ge, Fei Lian son, early died. Had son called Nu Fang. Nu Fang gave birth Pang Gao, Pang Gao gave birth Tai Ji, Tai Ji gave birth Da Luo, Da Luo gave birth Fei Zi. With Zao Fu favor, all received Zhao city, surname Zhao clan.

sentences.zh: 非子居犬丘，好馬及畜，善養息之。

translations.text: Fei Zi dwelt Quan Qiu, liked horses and livestock, good raised multiplied them.

sentences.zh: 犬丘人言之周孝王，孝王召使主馬于汧渭之閒，馬大蕃息。

translations.text: Quan Qiu people spoke of to Zhou Xiao Wang, Xiao Wang summoned made him master horses at Qian Wei between, horses greatly multiplied.

sentences.zh: 孝王欲以為大駱適嗣。

translations.text: Xiao Wang wished make him Da Luo proper heir.

sentences.zh: 申侯之女為大駱妻，生子成為適。

translations.text: Shen Hou woman for Da Luo wife, gave birth son Cheng as proper.

sentences.zh: 申侯乃言孝王曰：「昔我先酈山之女，為戎胥軒妻，生中潏，以親故歸周，保西垂，西垂以其故和睦。

translations.text: Shen Hou then spoke Xiao Wang said: 'Formerly our ancestor Li mountain woman, for Rong Xu Xuan wife, gave birth Zhong Jue, because relatives returned Zhou, protected western border, western border because this harmonious.

sentences.zh: 今我復與大駱妻，生適子成。

translations.text: Now I again with Da Luo wife, gave birth proper son Cheng.

sentences.zh: 申駱重婚，西戎皆服，所以為王。

translations.text: Shen Luo repeated marriage, western Rong all submitted, so served wang.

sentences.zh: 王其圖之。」

translations.text: Wang its plan it.'

sentences.zh: 於是孝王曰：「昔伯翳為舜主畜，畜多息，故有土，賜姓嬴。

translations.text: Then Xiao Wang said: 'Formerly Bo Yi for Shun master livestock, livestock many multiplied, thus had earth, granted surname Ying.

sentences.zh: 今其後世亦為朕息馬，朕其分土為附庸。」

translations.text: Now their descendants also for Us multiply horses, Us its divide earth as attached state.'

sentences.zh: 邑之秦，使復續嬴氏祀，號曰秦嬴。

translations.text: Settled Qin, made continue Ying clan sacrifices, titled Qin Ying.

sentences.zh: 亦不廢申侯之女子為駱適者，以和西戎。

translations.text: Also not abolished Shen Hou woman as Luo proper, to harmonize western Rong.

Fei Zi dwelt Quan Qiu, liked horses and livestock, good raised multiplied them. Quan Qiu people spoke of to Zhou Xiao Wang, Xiao Wang summoned made him master horses at Qian Wei between, horses greatly multiplied. Xiao Wang wished make him Da Luo proper heir. Shen Hou woman for Da Luo wife, gave birth son Cheng as proper. Shen Hou then spoke Xiao Wang said: 'Formerly our ancestor Li mountain woman, for Rong Xu Xuan wife, gave birth Zhong Jue, because relatives returned Zhou, protected western border, western border because this harmonious. Now I again with Da Luo wife, gave birth proper son Cheng. Shen Luo repeated marriage, western Rong all submitted, so served wang. Wang its plan it.' Then Xiao Wang said: 'Formerly Bo Yi for Shun master livestock, livestock many multiplied, thus had earth, granted surname Ying. Now their descendants also for Us multiply horses, Us its divide earth as attached state.' Settled Qin, made continue Ying clan sacrifices, titled Qin Ying. Also not abolished Shen Hou woman as Luo proper, to harmonize western Rong.

sentences.zh: 秦嬴生秦侯。

translations.text: Qin Ying give birth Qin Hou.

sentences.zh: 秦侯立十年，卒。

translations.text: Qin Hou establish ten years, die.

sentences.zh: 生公伯。

translations.text: Give birth Gong Bo.

sentences.zh: 公伯立三年，卒。

translations.text: Gong Bo establish three years, die.

sentences.zh: 生秦仲。

translations.text: Give birth Qin Zhong.
Qin Ying give birth Qin Hou. Qin Hou establish ten years, die. Give birth Gong Bo. Gong Bo establish three years, die. Give birth Qin Zhong.

sentences.zh: 秦仲立三年，周厲王無道，諸侯或叛之。

translations.text: Qin Zhong establish three years, Zhou Li Wang without way, feudal lords or rebel him.

sentences.zh: 西戎反王室，滅犬丘大駱之族。

translations.text: West Rong rebel wang chamber, extinguish Quan Qiu Da Luo clan.

sentences.zh: 周宣王即位，乃以秦仲為大夫，誅西戎。

translations.text: Zhou Xuan Wang establish, then with Qin Zhong as da fu, punish west Rong.

sentences.zh: 西戎殺秦仲。

translations.text: West Rong kill Qin Zhong.

sentences.zh: 秦仲立二十三年，死於戎。

translations.text: Qin Zhong establish twenty three years, die at Rong.

sentences.zh: 有子五人，其長者曰莊公。

translations.text: Have son five people, its long said Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 周宣王乃召莊公昆弟五人，與兵七千人，使伐西戎，破之。

translations.text: Zhou Xuan Wang then summon Zhuang Gong brothers five people, with troops seven thousand, make attack west Rong, break it.

sentences.zh: 於是復予秦仲後，及其先大駱地犬丘并有之，為西垂大夫。

translations.text: Then again grant Qin Zhong after, reach its previous Da Luo earth Quan Qiu and have it, become west pendant da fu.

Qin Zhong establish three years, Zhou Li Wang without way, feudal lords or rebel him. West Rong rebel wang chamber, extinguish Quan Qiu Da Luo clan. Zhou Xuan Wang establish, then with Qin Zhong as da fu, punish west Rong. West Rong kill Qin Zhong. Qin Zhong establish twenty three years, die at Rong. Have son five people, its long said Zhuang Gong. Zhou Xuan Wang then summon Zhuang Gong brothers five people, with troops seven thousand, make attack west Rong, break it. Then again grant Qin Zhong after, reach its previous Da Luo earth Quan Qiu and have it, become west pendant da fu.

sentences.zh: 莊公居其故西犬丘，生子三人，其長男世父。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong dwell its old west Quan Qiu, give birth son three people, its long male Shi Fu.

sentences.zh: 世父曰：「戎殺我大父仲，我非殺戎王則不敢入邑。」

translations.text: Shi Fu said: 'Rong kill my grandfather Zhong, I not kill Rong wang then not dare enter yi.'

sentences.zh: 遂將擊戎，讓其弟襄公。

translations.text: Then will strike Rong, yield its younger brother Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 襄公為太子。

translations.text: Xiang Gong become crown prince.

sentences.zh: 莊公立四十四年，卒，太子襄公代立。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong establish forty four years, die, crown prince Xiang Gong replace establish.

sentences.zh: 襄公元年，以女弟繆嬴為豐王妻。

translations.text: Xiang Gong first year, with woman younger sister Miao Ying as Feng wang wife.

sentences.zh: 襄公二年，戎圍犬丘，（世父）世父擊之，為戎人所虜。

translations.text: Xiang Gong two years, Rong surround Quan Qiu, (Shi Fu) Shi Fu strike it, become Rong people capture.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，復歸世父。

translations.text: Year remain, again return Shi Fu.

sentences.zh: 七年春，周幽王用褒姒廢太子，立褒姒子為適，數欺諸侯，諸侯叛之。

translations.text: Seven years spring, Zhou You Wang use Bao Si abolish crown prince, establish Bao Si son as di, number cheat feudal lords, feudal lords rebel him.

sentences.zh: 西戎犬戎與申侯伐周，殺幽王酈山下。

translations.text: West Rong Quan Rong with Shen Hou attack Zhou, kill You Wang Li mountain below.

sentences.zh: 而秦襄公將兵救周，戰甚力，有功。

translations.text: Yet Qin Xiang Gong will troops save Zhou, battle very force, have merit.

sentences.zh: 周避犬戎難，東徙雒邑，襄公以兵送周平王。

translations.text: Zhou avoid Quan Rong difficulty, east move Luo Yi, Xiang Gong with troops send Zhou Ping Wang.

sentences.zh: 平王封襄公為諸侯，賜之岐以西之地。

translations.text: Ping Wang seal Xiang Gong as feudal lord, grant it Qi west earth.

sentences.zh: 曰：「戎無道，侵奪我岐、豐之地，秦能攻逐戎，即有其地。」

translations.text: Said: 'Rong without way, invade seize my Qi, Feng earth, Qin able attack drive Rong, then have its earth.'

sentences.zh: 與誓，封爵之。

translations.text: With oath, seal rank it.

sentences.zh: 襄公於是始國，與諸侯通使聘享之禮，乃用騮駒、黃牛、羝羊各三，祠上帝西畤。

translations.text: Xiang Gong then begin state, with feudal lords pass make bet enjoy ritual, then use Liu Ju, yellow cow, Di sheep each three, sacrifice Shang Di west altar.

sentences.zh: 十二年，伐戎而至岐，卒。

translations.text: Twelve years, attack Rong yet reach Qi, die.

sentences.zh: 生文公。

translations.text: Give birth Wen Gong.

sentences.zh: 文公元年，居西垂宮。

translations.text: Wen Gong first year, dwell west pendant palace.

sentences.zh: 三年，文公以兵七百人東獵。

translations.text: Three years, Wen Gong with troops seven hundred east hunt.

sentences.zh: 四年，至汧渭之會。

translations.text: Four years, reach Qian Wei meeting.

sentences.zh: 曰：「昔周邑我先秦嬴於此，後卒獲為諸侯。」

translations.text: Said: 'Previously Zhou yi my previous Qin Ying at this, after finally obtain become feudal lord.'

sentences.zh: 乃卜居之，占曰吉，即營邑之。

translations.text: Then divine dwell it, occupy said auspicious, then camp yi it.

sentences.zh: 十年，初為鄜畤，用三牢。

translations.text: Ten years, initially established the Fu altar, using three sacrificial animals.

sentences.zh: 十三年，初有史以紀事，民多化者。

translations.text: Thirteen years, initial have shi to record affairs, people many change.

sentences.zh: 十六年，文公以兵伐戎，戎敗走。

translations.text: Sixteen years, Wen Gong with troops attack Rong, Rong defeat flee.

sentences.zh: 於是文公遂收周餘民有之，地至岐，岐以東獻之周。

translations.text: Then Wen Gong then collect Zhou remain people have it, earth reach Qi, Qi east offer Zhou.

sentences.zh: 十九年，得陳寶。

translations.text: Nineteen years, get Chen treasure.

sentences.zh: 二十年，法初有三族之罪。

translations.text: Twenty years, law initial have three clan crime.

sentences.zh: 二十七年，伐南山大梓，豐大特。

translations.text: Twenty seven years, attack south mountain big Ci, Feng big Te.

sentences.zh: 四十八年，文公太子卒，賜謚為竫公。

translations.text: Forty eight years, Wen Gong crown prince die, grant posthumous Ruo Gong.

sentences.zh: 竫公之長子為太子，是文公孫也。

translations.text: Ruo Gong long son become crown prince, is Wen Gong grandson.

sentences.zh: 五十年，文公卒，葬西山。

translations.text: Fifty years, Wen Gong die, bury west mountain.

sentences.zh: 竫公子立，是為寧公。

translations.text: Ruo Gong son establish, is Ning Gong.

sentences.zh: 寧公二年，公徙居平陽。

translations.text: Ning Gong two years, Gong move dwell Ping Yang.

sentences.zh: 遣兵伐蕩社。

translations.text: Send troops attack Tang She.

sentences.zh: 三年，與亳戰，亳王奔戎，遂滅蕩社。

translations.text: Three years, with Bo battle, Bo wang flee Rong, then extinguish Tang She.

sentences.zh: 四年，魯公子翬弒其君隱公。

translations.text: Four years, Lu Gong Zi Hui kill its lord Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 十二年，伐蕩氏，取之。

translations.text: Twelve years, attack Tang clan, take it.

sentences.zh: 寧公生十歲立，立十二年卒，葬西山。

translations.text: Ning Gong give birth ten years establish, establish twelve years die, bury west mountain.

sentences.zh: 生子三人，長男武公為太子。

translations.text: Give birth son three people, long male Wu Gong become crown prince.

sentences.zh: 武公弟德公，同母魯姬子。

translations.text: Wu Gong younger brother De Gong, same mother Lu Ji son.

sentences.zh: 生出子。

translations.text: Give birth Chu Zi.

sentences.zh: 寧公卒，大庶長弗忌、威壘、三父廢太子而立出子為君。

translations.text: Ning Gong die, big common long Fu Ji, Wei Lei, San Fu abolish crown prince yet establish Chu Zi as jun.

sentences.zh: 出子六年，三父等復共令人賊殺出子。

translations.text: Chu Zi six years, San Fu etc again together make person assassin kill Chu Zi.

sentences.zh: 出子生五歲立，立六年卒。

translations.text: Chu Zi give birth five years establish, establish six years die.
